name: EMPIRE OF PIXELS
description:
• EMPIRE OF PIXELS •

Empire of pixels is a simple turn-based game in which you will have to fight difficult battles in a world of pixels.Develop your empire and crush your opponent in battle.The game offers a map editor and a number of base maps.

• EMOTIONAL BATTLES •

Manage your army smartly to win.The stats of your units depend on the terrain they stand on. Try to keep your units well placed.It is best to place them on defense structures.

• BUILD FORTIFICATIONS •

Develop your empire through villages, castles and other fortifications. This helps a lot in defending against the enemy.

• RECRUIT UNITS •

Regural recruitment of new units is important because the enemy often attacks your capital. There are 7 units available in the game. Every unit has advantages and disadvantages.

• MAP EDITOR •

You can create your own map in the editor and play on it.
